speaker: Abraham Lincoln
text: Four score and seven years ago our fathers brought forth on this continent, a new nation...

speaker: Theodore Roosevelt
text: Speak softly and carry a big stick; you will go far.

speaker: Winston Churchill
text: We shall fight on the beaches, we shall fight on the landing grounds, we shall never surrender.

speaker: Jawaharlal Nehru
text: Long years ago we made a tryst with destiny, and now the time comes when we shall redeem our pledge.

speaker: Mahatma Gandhi
text: The mantra is 'Do or Die.' We shall either free India or die in the attempt.

speaker: Franklin D. Roosevelt
text: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.

speaker: Martin Luther King Jr.
text: I have a dream that one day this nation will rise up and live out the true meaning of its creed.

speaker: John F. Kennedy
text: Ask not what your country can do for you—ask what you can do for your country.

speaker: Barack Obama
text: Change has come to America.

speaker: Narendra Modi
text: This victory is the victory of the people.

speaker: Angela Merkel
text: We can manage this. We can do it.

speaker: Donald Trump
text: From this day forward, it's going to be only America first.

speaker: Joe Biden
text: We must end this uncivil war that pits red against blue.

speaker: Imran Khan
text: Pakistan will rise when justice prevails.

speaker: Lee Kuan Yew
text: We are going to build a democratic society in Singapore, based on justice and equality.

speaker: Nelson Mandela
text: Never, never and never again shall it be that this beautiful land will again experience the oppression of one by another.

speaker: Theresa May
text: Brexit means Brexit, and we are going to make a success of it.

speaker: Margaret Thatcher
text: Where there is discord, may we bring harmony.

speaker: Ronald Reagan
text: Mr. Gorbachev, tear down this wall!

speaker: George W. Bush
text: I can hear you, the rest of the world hears you, and the people who knocked these buildings down will hear all of us soon.

speaker: Narayan Murthy
text: Entrepreneurship is all about passion, perseverance, and patience.

speaker: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam
text: Dream, dream, dream. Dreams transform into thoughts and thoughts result in action.

speaker: Vladimir Putin
text: Crimea has always been an inseparable part of Russia.

speaker: Xi Jinping
text: We must remain committed to socialism with Chinese characteristics.

speaker: Justin Trudeau
text: Canada is back.

speaker: Jacinda Ardern
text: We are going to go hard, and we are going to go early.

speaker: Volodymyr Zelenskyy
text: We will fight for our land, we will fight for our freedom.

speaker: Emmanuel Macron
text: The world is watching us. Europe and the world are waiting for us to defend the spirit of Enlightenment.

speaker: Indira Gandhi
text: India stands by Bangladesh in their fight for liberation.

speaker: Atal Bihari Vajpayee
text: India is now a nuclear power — not to threaten others but to protect itself.

speaker: Manmohan Singh
text: This strategic partnership will be a milestone in Indo-US relations.

speaker: Periyar E.V. Ramasamy
text: The abolition of caste is essential for the progress of our society.

speaker: B.R. Ambedkar
text: We are going to enter a life of contradictions.

speaker: Chandrashekhar Azad
text: I will never be caught by the British, I shall die with freedom on my lips.

speaker: Subhas Chandra Bose
text: Give me blood, and I shall give you freedom!

speaker: Lal Bahadur Shastri
text: Jai Jawan Jai Kisan.

speaker: Sardar Patel
text: The unity of India should be our foremost objective.

speaker: Rajiv Gandhi
text: India is an old country, but a young nation.

speaker: Rosa Parks
text: I would like to be remembered as a person who wanted to be free... so other people would be also free.

speaker: Malcolm X
text: The future belongs to those who prepare for it today.

speaker: Greta Thunberg
text: How dare you? You have stolen my dreams and my childhood.

speaker: Malala Yousafzai
text: One child, one teacher, one book and one pen can change the world.

speaker: Albert Einstein
text: The release of atomic power has changed everything except our way of thinking.

speaker: Ernesto Che Guevara
text: The revolution is not an apple that falls when it is ripe. You have to make it fall.

speaker: Fidel Castro
text: Revolution is a struggle to the death between the future and the past.

speaker: Benazir Bhutto
text: Democracy is the best revenge.

speaker: Zulfikar Ali Bhutto
text: We will wage a thousand-year war.
